triples.name: Stochastic process
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a stochastic modeling approach to estimate citation reading rates based on probabilistic citation patterns.

triples.name: Citation analysis
triples.relevance: Citation analysis is the core task the paper addresses - examining patterns in citations to infer reading behavior.

triples.name: Zipf's law
triples.relevance: The paper uses Zipf's law to explain the empirical distribution of misprints in citations, validating their stochastic model.
